detail_desc: Small purse in grained imitation patent leather with a tab and press-stud fastening. Six card compartments, one with a transparent plastic window, a note compartment at one side and a zipped outer compartment. Length approx. 10.5 cm. Height approx. 9 cm. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester.

Trousers in a cotton weave. High paper bag waist with pleats at the front, covered elastication at the back and a tie belt. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, front pockets and wide, gently tapered, loose-fitting legs with flap pockets.

Trousers in a cotton weave. High paper bag waist with pleats at the front, covered elastication at the back and a tie belt. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, front pockets and wide, gently tapered, loose-fitting legs with flap pockets.

Zip-through hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.

Zip-through hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.

Zip-through hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.

Zip-through hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.

One-shoulder sports bra in ribbed microfibre with one wide shoulder strap and wide ribbing at the hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

One-shoulder sports bra in ribbed microfibre with one wide shoulder strap and wide ribbing at the hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

One-shoulder sports bra in ribbed microfibre with one wide shoulder strap and wide ribbing at the hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Short skirt in lightweight, fast-drying functional fabric with short inner tights. The skirt has an elasticated waist and pleats for added mobility and a laser-cut hem.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Classic T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and short slits in the sides.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Short dress in organic linen with a voluminous bodice. Deep V-neck with pleats either side, a wrapover top, and smocking details on the shoulders and under the bust. Long balloon sleeves with pleats for added volume and narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Richly detailed back with an opening and pleats, a seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and a fitted skirt. Lined in an organic cotton weave.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Trousers in a linen and Tencel™ lyocell blend with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and zip fly. Side pockets and a jetted back pocket. Close-fitting at the top with pleats, relaxing at the hips into wide, straight legs with creases.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Mini skirt in taffeta made from recycled polyester with a draped effect. Large, gathered flounces with overlocked edges down one side and a concealed zip with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Lined in chiffon made from recycled polyester.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Fully lined bikini bottoms in fabric made from an Econyl® blend with a high waist, wide sides and medium coverage at the back. Lined partly in recycled polyester. Econyl® is nylon made from recycled fibres from fishing nets and other nylon waste, reducing impact on the climate and contributing to cleaner oceans.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Fully lined swimsuit in mosaic-patterned fabric made from an Econyl® blend with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in various ways. Econyl® is nylon made from recycled fibres from fishing nets and other nylon waste, reducing impact on the climate and contributing to cleaner oceans.
Flared, calf-length skirt in a patterned cotton weave with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Skirt in an airy, patterned cotton weave with a smocked waist. Cotton lining.

Set with a waistcoat, pair of shorts and matching shirt in a cotton weave and a pre-tied bow tie in a linen and cotton weave. Lined waistcoat with buttons at the front. Knee-length shorts with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and fake diagonal side pockets. Shirt with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and a plastic fastener at the back.

Wide, knee-length dress in mesh with a flock print. Round neckline, a small opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck, and long puff sleeves with smocking and a small frill trim at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and hem for added width and soft draping. V-neck underdress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps.

Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric containing some wool with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap welt front pockets, and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined. The jacket is made from COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.

Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric containing some wool. Low waist with covered elastication, a zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Legs with creases down the front and turn-ups at the hems. The trousers are made from COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Short, fitted cardigan in a fine knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Long hoodie in supersoft jersey with a brushed finish. Double-layered, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Fully lined, ribbed sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a deep V-neck and removable inserts that shape the bust. Wide, elastic shoulder straps that cross at the back and wide, covered elastication at the hem. Light support.

Fully lined, ribbed sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a deep V-neck and removable inserts that shape the bust. Wide, elastic shoulder straps that cross at the back and wide, covered elastication at the hem. Light support.

Polo shirt in soft cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with narrow ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.
Oversized T-shirt in mesh with a trim around the neckline and dropped shoulders.

Shorter, sleeveless top in soft jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with a deep V-neck, wide shoulder straps and narrow smocking at the front. Seam at the waist with a peplum.
Top in soft, crinkled jersey with a frilled collar, V-neck and long raglan sleeves. Smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs and hem.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline, embroidery on the front, short puff sleeves and a chest pocket.
Leggings in patterned jersey with flatlock seams and a high waist with covered elastication.
EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Cap in a patterned weave with a soft, lightly brushed finish. Small appliqué on the front, a cotton sweatband and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.

Set with a long-sleeved blouse in a cotton weave and a pair of leggings in soft jersey. Blouse with a frill-trimmed yoke, button placket and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist and lace-trimmed hems.

Reversible sun hat in soft, cotton jersey with one patterned side and one side in a solid colour. Narrow ties under the chin. Width of brim 5 cm.
